name: Astro Mania
description: A challenging arcade game developed in Python, where players navigate a spaceship through various levels.

name: Tetris Rush
description: A fast-paced version of the classic Tetris game, built with Python to offer an engaging puzzle-solving experience.

name: Bit Manipulation
description: Educational project that demonstrates various bit manipulation techniques using C programming.

name: Blackjack
description: A web-based version of the Blackjack card game, designed to provide a fun and interactive gaming experience.

name: Crazy 8 Game
description: Digital version of the popular Crazy 8 card game, developed to offer both single and multiplayer modes.

name: Connect 4
description: A Python implementation of the classic board game Connect 4. This project allows two players to compete directly, demonstrating Python's utility in developing interactive applications.

name: Flight-Ticket Management System
description: A system for managing flight tickets using C++. It efficiently handles bookings and schedules, showcasing advanced C++ programming and data structure utilization.

name: Contact Management System
description: A C++ based application designed to manage personal and professional contacts. It incorporates basic file handling and data management principles to organize contact information efficiently.

name: Task Manager
description: A JavaScript-based web application for managing tasks. It allows users to add, delete, and organize tasks with an interactive and user-friendly interface.

name: Budget Tracker Web App
description: This web app helps users track their expenses and manage their budget. Built using JavaScript, it provides insights into spending patterns with graphical data visualization.

name: Anonymous Course Review Site
description: A platform for students to anonymously submit and review feedback on courses and instructors. It fosters a culture of transparency and helps improve educational standards.
